name: Light's Out?
description:
Prototype created for 8 Bits to Infinity and Vimlark VimJam

Theme is THERE AND BACK, with the focus on COLLECTABLES.

We used extra challenges - Darkness and No enemies

You are a poor soul tasked with retrieving the gem from this ancient cave. 

Please do your best. We count on you.

Input: WASD / UpDownLeftRight for movement, SPACE for interactions. TAB for easy mode.

Project completed by team Purple Minions:

Bogdan A Fritz, Andreea Preda (carmine) and Eugen Moraru (emini0n).
